org.openimaj.stream.provider.irc

Class BasicIRCStreamDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.stream.AbstractStream<T>
      • org.openimaj.util.stream.BlockingDroppingBufferedStream<T>
        • org.openimaj.stream.provider.irc.AbstractIRCStreamDataset<Context>
          • org.openimaj.stream.provider.irc.BasicIRCStreamDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Context>, Iterator<Context>, Dataset<Context>, StreamingDataset<Context>, Stream<Context>

    public class BasicIRCStreamDataset
extends AbstractIRCStreamDataset<Context>
    Basic streaming dataset from IRC messages. Messages are provided as Context objects. The contexts contain keys for channel, sender, login, hostname and message. All values are Strings.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • BasicIRCStreamDataset

        public BasicIRCStreamDataset(String hostname,
                             String channel)
                      throws IOException
        Connect to the given host and channel. Internally a ArrayBlockingDroppingQueue with size of 1 is created to buffer/drop messages.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the host
        channel - the channel
        Throws:
        IOException
